notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was funded by the Ministry of Economic and Finance of Panama, grants 9044-020 (Y.D.) and 9044-051 (S.L.-V.), and SENACYT FID09-103 (J.-P.C.). S.L.-V. got the UNESCO-Lâ€™OREAL International fellowship for Young Women in Science 2014. N.V. dengue research is partially funded by the National Institutes of Health grant R24AI120942. B.A. (DI-UIP 6338000) is supported by Research Direction, Universidad Interamericana de Panama.
